data.strFullDescription:
[b]Tropico 3: Absolute Power[/b] is the first official expansion pack to the critically acclaimed [b]Tropico 3[/b] and provides all-new options as ruler of a small Caribbean island nation.  It adds a new campaign, new missions, new island types, unique buildings and new powers to maximize the length and success of your term in power.

[list][*][b]New campaign[/b] featuring 10 all-new missions and islands
[*][b]New buildings[/b] garbage dump, marina, grade school, etc.
[*][b]New edicts[/b] declare an annual festival dedicated to yourself, print your own money or outlaw your most annoying political faction among others.
[*][b]New traits and appearances[/b] to take El Presidente's power to the next level.
[*][b]New huge landmarks[/b] huge decorations and structures as a reward for political and economical success to make your island unique.
[*][b]New "loyalist" faction [/b] comprised of your die-hard supporters.
[*][b]More radio announcements[/b] and a new radio station with witty comments on your actions in the game.[/list]
